Name: SCUFF(ED)
About the game: Brawl it out in a Super Casual Ultimate Fight Fest (Extra Deluxe) [SCUFFED], where up to 6 players can fight for the top by customizing their loadouts with more than 20 skill-altering passives! The player with the most points at the end of 6 rounds wins! Features Up to 6 players online 4 different classes Various game changing passives 3 different Arenas Choose from 4 unique classes, each fitted with 2 skills. Customize abilities after each round. Pick from a variety of passives as well as one game altering passive every game!! And a big thank you to these awesome people that helped us playtest the game Cavan Low Nabilah Nazmi Calvin Seah Samuel Chen Quek Ming Kang Soh Rui Ming Shaun Ng Aaron Chu Ashraf Azhar Tan Cheng Ying Aqil Hilmi Ho Heng Wan Justin Simon Maximilian Gay Tan Yun Yang Louis Choo Koh Jia Ming Ivan Ho Joseph Cheng Tan Heng Chee Lee Wei Da Dave Kang Samuel Soh Amir Janus Gohan Terence Oh Jun Yang Jeryl goh Darren Tey Jasper Lim Yeo Chong Ye Jonathan Yap Nathaniel Chong Wei Xiang Keith Goh Samuel Lum
